Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'After the two of you return from your "mission," Lee has been staying inside his room without coming out or mentioning assassinating anyone for you.'}
{3: 'Is Lee... really doing fine?'}
{3: 'You still worry about him as dusk arrives after you have finished your battle with the various documents.'}
{3: 'He should be fine, right...?'}
{3: 'You still knock on his door despite that.'}
{2: 'Lee? How are you doing?'}
{3: 'The voice in the room sounds dull but not hurt or in trouble.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Inside the room, Lee is flipping through the open notebook on the desk with a solemn expression.'}
{3: 'Different handwritings pen the pages, the mellow strokes getting more and more aggressive the further back in the notebook they are.'}
{3: 'Lee flips to the first page again, reading the fragmented lines with furrowed brows.'}
{3: 'The childish, wavy letters protest on the pages.'}
{1: "I only grazed the commandant's ear by accident when I was still unfamiliar with the gun.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I even succeeded in defeating the Corrupted that ambushed Commandant.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Now I know what kind of monsters Corrupted are. They're terrible.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'That said, the fragrance of milk surges in his taste module once again.'}
{3: 'Constructs do not need to drink this kind of nutritional composite solution, but he still received such special treatment...'}
{3: "Flipping to the next page, Lee finds even more frenzied handwriting. His penmanship was rough and scrawly back then when he was worried about Murray's illness and making a living."}
{1: 'Corrupted, the Punishing Virus, the Red Tide, the Hetero Tower... Is that the kind of dark future awaiting me?', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But the ice cream was sweet.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Wasn't expecting the commandant to be so familiar with this weapon.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'At the back of the page is a sketch of ice cream and his weapon, followed by a long trail—an arc similar to the trajectory of the chair he threw that day.'}
{3: 'An assassin who has mastered every "weapon" would never have missed.'}
{3: 'The moment he saw his "target"... something inside him interrupted his precise aim.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Luckily, the chair missed the commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He is still startled by the incident after the fact. He should have applied for the observational room in the first place...'}

{3: "A few leaves have fallen from the plant on his desk due to the lack of care when Lee was away for missions. A breeze created by Babylonia's ecosystem blows one of them onto the notebook as it curls up and rolls."}
{3: 'Lee turns to the next page, where he finds two paragraphs of similar handwriting. Inspecting closely, he can still tell the difference.'}

{1: "I shouldn't have told Commandant about this. I should just pretend to be on a mission and stay in an empty room.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Temporarily redeploying a Gray Raven member requires the Gray Raven Commandant's approval, not to mention sending one on a long-term mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'What was he thinking when he wrote this?'}
{3: 'That said, he was just assigned to Gray Raven back then. He was constantly cautious about his companions... and his commandant.'}
{3: 'The handwriting after that does not differ much from his now. The messy notes document some test results on his M.I.N.D. and his hypothesis on the M.I.N.D. disorder.'}

{1: "Asimov's report only indicates that this is abnormal data leaking, but what could be causing it in such a new frame?", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I went out a few times in the middle of the night. Commandant's light was still on.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The commandant was sleeping on the desk with the reports and data of the specialized frame all around.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Commandant's life hasn't been easy lately either.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You should leave something behind as an appreciation and a reminder.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'That is the last line in the notebook.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...There's nothing about this event that's worth being reminded of.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Closing his notebook, Lee is almost done compiling his M.I.N.D. shards. His memories gradually merge, and those blurry fragments replay in his M.I.N.D. like colorful movies.'}
{3: 'The colors slowly fill the gaps in his memories. Even the old, insignificant cracks are tinted with brilliant shades.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: "The rustling of paper suddenly stops inside Lee's room, replaced with the sound of clanging metal—"}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}

{3: 'You walk back and forth in front of his door for a little while before deciding to knock. Right then, the door opens, and you find Lee staring at you expressionlessly while holding a small hand file.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Passing by? I don't recall my room leading to anywhere.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite saying that, Lee still moves aside a little and gestures for you to come in and talk.'}
{3: 'His room is as tidy as ever, but an open notebook on his desk has caught your eye.'}
{2: 'Have you started writing a diary, Lee?', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's not a diary. It's just...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee stumbles with his words, failing to come up with a more fitting description.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's just entries I made while my M.I.N.D. presented unexpected problems. They help me with studying the symptoms of my M.I.N.D. disorder.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you here for something important?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assemble in the leisure hall at seven tonight. I have something to announce.', 3: '75'}
{3: 'Given the progress the M.I.N.D. shards have been compiling, this will be around the time Asimov expected it to be complete.'}
{3: "Just in case, you have prepared sticky notes to put on Lee's door in case his M.I.N.D. switches again and forgets about this."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I can't help but suspect that you are planning to ambush me at the hall, given how shady and cautious you are acting.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the notes that are neatly taped onto the desk, Lee looks down as if trying to hide something.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But since it is your request, Commandant... I will be there tonight.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hesitating to speak, Lee puts down the file in his hand.'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '82'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've brought you many troubles recently, haven't I?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This weird M.I.N.D. disorder... I...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It wasn't your fault."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What if... this disorder can never be cured?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What if the temporary amnesia and M.I.N.D. shards switching never stop?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I suppose I can retire, then.', 3: '88'}
{2: "We'll retire and become traveling merchants.", 3: '90'}
{3: "The occasional M.I.N.D. disorder does not diminish Lee's combat prowess."}
{3: 'It is not so bad to travel the earth as a merchant while taking out some Corrupted on the way.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'That sounds pretty nice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, how are you doing?', 3: '96'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My M.I.N.D. is almost clear. That "incurable" situation was just a speculation. It will never happen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Ahem. By the way, I'm planning to give you something. For the trouble I've caused.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is there anything you want? A firearm repair kit? Or a new alarm-bot?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee will probably feel guilty for a while if you ask for nothing, given his character.'}
{2: 'How about... your notebook?', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What notebook?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't you say you recorded the symptoms of your M.I.N.D. disorder?", 3: '104'}
{3: "A notebook with detailed accounts of these symptoms must be helpful to understand Lee's current frame upon further study."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'Seemingly surprised by your answer, Lee takes a step back stiffly.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Anything else?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's it.", 3: '112', 4: 'See you tonight.', 5: '112'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...See you tonight.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Quietly and awkwardly he closes the door—blocking the door briefly with his fingers so that he does not make any noise.'}
{3: 'As always.'}
